q_ch: 使用 Leather 的裁剪任务有哪些？
gt:
Hey there! 😄 It looks like you're curious about which cutting tasks involve the use of leather. Based on the data I have, here are the cutting task IDs that use leather:

| Cutting Task ID |
|-----------------|
| 5               |
| 11              |
| 16              |
| 24              |
| 27              |
| 31              |
| 32              |

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Leather';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT wip_id FROM wip_material WHERE origin_material_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the WIP material ID that uses the material "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id = '8';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that use the WIP material "Leather"
